function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid completion of a single reviewer study of 200+ papers","Impact":"Potential sacrifice of quality for expeditiousness, leading to biased or incomplete results","Mitigation":"Use of multiple reviewers, adherence to rigorous review protocols, and thorough validation of findings","Technologies":"Review management software, machine learning for data extraction, and collaborative research platforms","People":"Researchers, authors, and stakeholders relying on the study's findings","Owner":"Research institutions, review coordinators, and funding bodies"},{"Description":"Influence of author's affect, emotion, and biography on the review process","Impact":"Potential bias in study selection and interpretation, affecting the comprehensiveness and objectivity of the review","Mitigation":"Implementation of clearly defined review criteria, independent verification of study selection, and consideration of diverse perspectives","Technologies":"Automated screening tools, sentiment analysis algorithms, and diversity-aware recommendation systems","People":"Authors, reviewers, and research collaborators","Owner":"Research ethics committees, peer review panels, and editorial boards"},{"Description":"Limited space to provide systematic coverage of all themes for each type of harm identified","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important aspects of the research, leading to incomplete representation of the literature and potential oversights","Mitigation":"Detailed documentation of review methodology and rationale for theme selection, consideration of supplementary materials, and transparent reporting of limitations","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, interactive literature maps, and multimedia supplements","People":"Readers, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Research authors, reviewers, and publishers"}]}
